name: Klaus Yoko,  a soft and round plush
description:
Klaus Yoko is so soft and nice!
His peculiar shape gives him a mysterious and enigmatic presence.
Klaus Yoko is definitely the plush you can make up stories with. 
You will love having him at home.
Klaus Yoko is made with fabric i bought in Kyoto. For him i chose two traditional japanese patterns.
Klaus Yoko is for you and the ones you love.
Klaus Yoko measures approximately 7.8  x7.8 inches (20x20 cm)
Klaus Yoko has a 100% cotton fabric and is filled with an anti-dustmite proof padding. 

Handmade in Paris

Only quality fabrics are used. I take great care in the fabrication process of my products. All of my objects are made in a non-smoker environment
Each object is a limited edition and is numbered.
Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions. 

Thank you for visiting my shop!

name: Gnou Bonhomme, a soft embroidered plush
description:
Gnou Bonhomme is an adorable creature who is just made for you! So soft, light and fluffy, he is the ideal friend! he will love seating by your side on your couch or being hugged in your bed. 
Gnou Bonhomme is very soft and is decorated with a handmade backstitch embroidery. 
Lovely and charming, Gnou Bonhomme will know how to take care of the ones you love.
Gnou Bonhome measures approximately 9.8 x11.8 inches (25x30 cm)
Gnou Bonhome has a 100% cotton fabric and is filled with an anti-dustmite proof padding.
Handmade in Paris
Only quality fabrics are used. I take great care in the fabrication process of my products. All of my objects are made in a non-smoker environment. 
Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions. 
Each object is a limited edition ans is numbered. 
Thank you for visiting my shop!

name: Soft Little Cloud Pillow
description:
Petit Nuage (Little Cloud) is designed for poets and dreamers. It is a little piece of sky in your home. Each side if this Petit Nuage is of a different colour: one blue and one dark brown.
Petit Nuage measures approximately 15.7 x 5.9 inches (40x15cm).
Petit Nuage has a 100% cotton fabric and is filled with an anti-dustmite proof padding. 

Handmade in Paris

Only quality fabrics are used. I take great care in the fabrication process of my products. All of my objects are made in a non-smoker environment
Each object is a limited edition and is numbered.
Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions. 

Thank you for visiting my shop!

name: Madonna di Guadalupe cushion
description:
With its bright colors and its peculiar pattern, this pillow doesn’t go unnoticed. Its pattern is Madonna di Guadalupe (a popular mexican religious and cultural figure). An off-beat and original object. 
it measures 19.7 x13.8 inches (50x35cm).
This cushion has a 100% cotton madonna di guadalupe pattern with gold sparkle accents and a black velvet back. 

Handmade in Paris

Only quality fabrics are used. I take great care in the fabrication process of my products. All of my objects are made in a non-smoker environment
Each object is a limited edition and is numbered.
Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions. 
Thank you for visiting my shop!

Albane.
